doc.after: Andrew Orlowski a frequent Wikipedia critic and writer for The Register a British technology news and opinion website criticized Jimmy Wales for hiring Essjay at the venture capital funded Wikia and for appointing him to the Wikipedia Arbitration Committee ArbCom after Essjay had apparently admitted his previously claimed academic and professional credentials were false Orlowski added that Essjay s actions betrayed a dangerous community mindset within Wikipedia 36 Jimmy Wales had said that the appointment was at the request of and with unanimous support of ArbCom 37
